languages.text: "Нам что-то хотели сказать. Извращенную логику убийц довольно трудно понять".
"The killer wanted to tell us something. It can be difficult to make sense of a murderer's twisted logic."
languages.original_text: "Нам что-то хотели сказать. Извращенную логику убийц довольно трудно понять".

traits.locale_text: "The killer wanted to tell us something. It can be difficult to make sense of a murderer's twisted logic."
"The killer wanted to tell us something. It can be difficult to make sense of a murderer's twisted logic."
"The killer wanted to tell us something. It can be difficult to make sense of a murderer's twisted logic."

"The killer wanted to tell us something. It can be difficult to make sense of a murderer's twisted logic."
"The killer wanted to tell us something. It can be difficult to make sense of a murderer's twisted logic."

languages.text: « Visiblement, le coupable cherchait à nous adresser un message. Allez savoir ce qui se passe dans l'esprit tordu d'un assassin sanguinaire. »
languages.original_text: "The killer wanted to tell us something. It can be difficult to make sense of a murderer's twisted logic."

traits.locale_text: « Visiblement, le coupable cherchait à nous adresser un message. Allez savoir ce qui se passe dans l'esprit tordu d'un assassin sanguinaire. »

languages.text: «El asesino quería decirnos algo. No es fácil entender la lógica retorcida de esas personas».
languages.original_text: "The killer wanted to tell us something. It can be difficult to make sense of a murderer's twisted logic."

traits.locale_text: «El asesino quería decirnos algo. No es fácil entender la lógica retorcida de esas personas».

languages.text: “凶手想告诉我们某些事情，有时候我们很难理解凶手扭曲的逻辑。”
languages.original_text: "The killer wanted to tell us something. It can be difficult to make sense of a murderer's twisted logic."

traits.locale_text: “凶手想告诉我们某些事情，有时候我们很难理解凶手扭曲的逻辑。”

languages.text: 「殺人犯は何かを言いたそうだ。だが、犯人の狂った思想を理解するのは難しい」
languages.original_text: "The killer wanted to tell us something. It can be difficult to make sense of a murderer's twisted logic."

traits.locale_text: 「殺人犯は何かを言いたそうだ。だが、犯人の狂った思想を理解するのは難しい」

languages.text: "Der Mörder wollte uns etwas mitteilen. Es kann schwierig sein, die kranke Logik eines Mörders zu ergründen."
languages.original_text: "The killer wanted to tell us something. It can be difficult to make sense of a murderer's twisted logic."

traits.locale_text: "Der Mörder wollte uns etwas mitteilen. Es kann schwierig sein, die kranke Logik eines Mörders zu ergründen."

languages.text: "Katil bize bir şey söylemek istemiş. Katilin sapkın mantığını kavramak zor olabilir."
languages.original_text: "The killer wanted to tell us something. It can be difficult to make sense of a murderer's twisted logic."
